item.title: Debug MPI program with Visual Studio Code
item.description: Debugging MPI program can be a nightmare. I explain how easily you can debug a parallel MPI program with visual studio (VS) code.

item.title: MPI race condition
item.description: When a buffer, which is involved in an uncompleted non-blocking communication, is used in another communication, there will be a race to read and write the buffer.

item.title: Handy cross-platform packages to connect to a remote Linux server
item.description: Interaction with a remote Linux server like transferring files, editing code, or accessing the remote desktop can be much easier with these free cross-platform packages.

item.title: The difference between modes of MPI send
item.description: There are different modes of MPI send: MPI_Send, MPI_Isend, MPI_Ssend, MPI_Bsend, and so on. They can be local or non-local, blocking or non-blocking, and synchronous or asynchronous. Their definition and differences are explained here in detail.

item.title: Host a .Net core web application for less than $5 a month
item.description: I talk about Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Microsoft Azure and Heroku. You can register with them and try their services for free or very low prices.
